posts.post_title: T206 Red Cobb, HOF/Common Mid-Tier Backs
posts.post_content:
I have the following T206's available for sale/trade.  The prices listed are for PayPal FF or cash.  If using regular PayPal please add an additional 3%.  All prices include delivery.  Please send me a PM or email me at [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url] if interested, and I will send scans.

Graded:
Bender No Trees PSA 2 - $112
Bliss EPDG SGC 40 - $88
Cobb Red Portrait PSA 4 - $3175
Hoffman, Dan AB 350 Frame PSA 4 (MC) - $124
Hummel AB 460 GAI 5.5 1st Graded - $545
Kroh Cycle 350 SGC 50 - $184
Lattimore Cycle 350 PSA 3 - $112
McCauley Hindu SGC 30 - $415
Miller Carolina Brights SGC 10 (Much Nicer than the Grade) - $625
Miller BVG 5 Cycle 350 - $260
Pickering Cycle 350 PSA 4 - $184
Titus Cycle 350 PSA 3 - $328

Beckley -  $92
